videos.description: Miles Bridges gets Charlotte going with a nice scoop in the paint.

videos.description: Charlotte's James Bouknight makes an instant impact off the bench by draining an off-balance shot plus the foul.

videos.headline: LaMelo picks Hartenstein's pocket and finishes with a slam

videos.description: Justise Winslow rejects Terry Rozier with an emphatic swat for the Clippers.
